#summary Lightning Memory-Mapped Database storage
#labels Stage-Beta,Type-Storage

= Introduction =

This is a storage module using OpenLDAP Lightning Memory-Mapped Database as backend.

= Dependencies =

[https://github.com/shmul/lightningdbm lightningdbm] is required to access LMDB databases.

= Details =

Refer to [https://prosody.im/doc/storage Prosodys data storage documentation].

= Compatibility =

|| >=0.9 || Should work ||
